summary: Adds a basement to Breezehome that lets the player show off all of the artifacts and quest items they have collected throughout the game.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod I made because I couldn't find any others that did something similar. Most other houses I've seen have like 85 weapon racks, and 48 mannequins and I never had enough gear to fill them all. I also didn't need automatic shelves, more crafting tools, or anything else. All I wanted was a cool place to show off quest items. So here it is.

Includes mounting locations for:
-Dragon Claws
-Dragon Priest Masks
-Daedric Artifacts
-Paragon Jewels
-Elder Scrolls
-Black Books
-Bugs in a Jar
-Most of the unique/artifact weapons and armor I could identify (with a few exceptions)

Requires:
Dawnguard, Hearthfire, Dragonborn DLC

Credits:
Arthmoor for lots of random help along the way
Sjogga for some tutorials I used to get started
Berticus for some tutorials and also the 'shell' of the basement that I cleaned out and redecorated
author: Arieswind

files.name: Breezehome Trophy Room
